question:
Ganga Flood Control Commission (GFCC):
  1. has its headquarters at Patna
  2. is a subordinate office of National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA)
Which of the above is / are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u> because Ganga Flood Control Commission (GFCC) has its headquarters at Patna. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u> because Ganga Flood Control Commission (GFCC) is a subordinate office of Ministry of Water Resources.
